foodItems.name: Apple
foodItems.description: A healthy fruit rich in fiber and vitamins.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Good for digestion, helps with weight loss, lowers risk of heart disease.

foodItems.name: Banana
foodItems.description: A popular fruit known for its high potassium content.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Provides energy, supports heart health, aids digestion.

foodItems.name: Broccoli
foodItems.description: A cruciferous vegetable packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.
foodItems.vitamins: Vitamin C, Vitamin K, Vitamin A
foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports immune health, promotes bone health, may reduce cancer risk.

foodItems.name: Carrot
foodItems.description: A root vegetable known for its high beta-carotene content.
foodItems.vitamins: Vitamin A, Vitamin K, Vitamin C
foodItems.healthBenefits: Improves vision, supports skin health, reduces cancer risk.

foodItems.name: Chicken Breast
foodItems.description: A lean source of protein that is low in fat.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports muscle growth, aids in weight loss, boosts immune function.

foodItems.name: Salmon
foodItems.description: A fatty fish rich in omega-3 fatty acids and high-quality protein.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports heart health, improves brain function, reduces inflammation.

foodItems.name: Spinach
foodItems.description: A leafy green vegetable loaded with vitamins and minerals.
foodItems.vitamins: Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin K
foodItems.healthBenefits: Boosts immune health, improves eye health, supports bone health.

foodItems.name: Strawberry
foodItems.description: A sweet and juicy berry packed with vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Promotes heart health, regulates blood sugar levels, improves skin health.

foodItems.name: Sweet Potato
foodItems.description: A nutritious root vegetable high in fiber and vitamins.
foodItems.vitamins: Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin B6
foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports eye health, boosts immune function, promotes gut health.

foodItems.name: Tomato
foodItems.description: A versatile fruit commonly used as a vegetable, rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports heart health, improves skin health, reduces cancer risk.

foodItems.name: Almonds

foodItems.healthBenefits: Supports heart health, aids in weight management, promotes gut health.
